entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TPH Issue with navigation property when class not in same assembly #27122
  • Migrate from EFCore5 to EFCore6 - my first migration adds annotations for some properties in every single table. Why? #27121
  • SelectMany query on OwnsMany relationship throws exception #27120
  • Use of AddDbContextFactory() can't be easily overridden by Unit Tests #27118
  • How to perform multiple aggregates without a group by clause? #27117
  • Use ef core in source generators #27116
  • Migrator throwing "The migration was not found." #27115
  • With .NET 6, Some Navigation scenario doesn't contain column from Left join in Order By caluse #27114
  • Stop eagerly loading methods/members via reflection which aren't necessarily needed #27113
    7.0.0
  • "The entity of type ... does not have any property with a non-default value to identify whether the entity exists" #27111
  • upgrading from EF Core 5.0.2 to 6.0.1 making Nunit unit test to fail #27110

Closed

  • Possible breaking change from 5.0.12 to 6.0.1 when using ExecutionStrategy property on RelationalDbContextOptionsBuilder #27018
  • EFCore 6 - Model is not getting validated when multiple columns have ValueGeneratedOnAdd() #27016
  • compiler errors in compiled model #27007
  • Referencing Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Tools from a WASDK 1.0 / WinUI 3 / .NET 6 project causes build to fail. #26973
  • Fluent Api - .Ignore() doesn't work for a specific property #27080
  • Referencing Base Type and Sub Type in same entity results in Ambiguous FK exception #26961
  • building an app with PublishTrimmed trims too much #27069
  • How do I find which entity (or entities) are throwing a circular dependency when reinitialising a scaffold? #27053
  • Website cannot load Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore #27029
  • Ef Core update 3.x to 5.x Connection String not working when using localhost ip instead of "localhost" #27112
  • Subquery is not translated #27082

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Query: Update column expression correctly when lifting joins from group by aggregate subquery #27109
  • [release/6.0] Lift GroupByAggregate when correlation predicate matches #27108

Merged

  • Fix spelling in LoggingDefinitions.LogSaveChangesCanceled. #27119

Updated

  • Stop using GetRequired* reflection wrappers to enable trimming #27099
